items.sentence: That was the last time that Tom was seen alive.

This is the first time I\'ve seen one of these.
Tom will be arriving by train tomorrow evening.
Tom will be staying in Boston for three months.
Tom isn\'t planning on going to Boston with us.
Tom isn\'t the one you should be worried about.
Tom and Mary borrowed money to buy their house.
Tom and Mary both said they saw John hit Alice.
Tom and Mary both want to learn how to do that.
